title: Bootstrap failure with Clang
body:
Output:

```
make[2]: Entering directory `/media/ryan/stuff/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/llvm/lib/Support'
llvm[2]: Compiling APFloat.cpp for Release+Asserts build
In file included from /media/ryan/stuff/rust/src/llvm/lib/Support/APFloat.cpp:17:
In file included from /media/ryan/stuff/rust/src/llvm/include/llvm/ADT/FoldingSet.h:21:
/media/ryan/stuff/rust/src/llvm/include/llvm/Support/Allocator.h:425:65: error: 
      'S' does not refer to a value
      Size, std::min((size_t)llvm::NextPowerOf2(Size), offsetof(S, x)));
                                                                ^
/media/ryan/stuff/rust/src/llvm/include/llvm/Support/Allocator.h:415:10: note: 
      declared here
  struct S {
         ^
/media/ryan/stuff/rust/src/llvm/include/llvm/Support/Allocator.h:425:68: error: 
      use of undeclared identifier 'x'
      Size, std::min((size_t)llvm::NextPowerOf2(Size), offsetof(S, x)));
                                                                   ^
2 errors generated.
make[2]: *** [/media/ryan/stuff/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/llvm/lib/Support/Release+Asserts/APFloat.o] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory `/media/ryan/stuff/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/llvm/lib/Support'
make[1]: *** [all] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory `/media/ryan/stuff/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/llvm'
make: *** [/home/ryan/stuff/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/llvm/Release+Asserts/bin/llvm-config] Error 2
ryan@DevPC-LX:~/stuff/rust$ 
```

Using Clang 3.6 SVN.
